t: r/fordfusion on Reddit: Is DetroitAxle brand reliable ? I want to freshen up my car’s suspensions. Too much noise on uneven roads.
s: January 7, 2023 - I bought it thru amazon but it was a 3rd party seller so amazon does not stand behind this companies products. and they have shipping insurance. So I spent $267.00 and 12.68 tax. they gave me a refund of $12.68 I am pissed needles to say... Beware as long as it does not get damaged it is a decent part but if you go cardon products they will not screw you on returns..... I reccomend not buying detroit axle ...
